articles.title: Battle moves into Kyiv as Ukrainians fight to keep control of their capital - CNN
articles.description: War arrived on the streets of the Ukrainian capital city Kyiv Saturday, as the country's military battled to hold back advancing Russian troops in multiple locations, forcing residents to seek shelter amid the sound of explosions and gunfire.
